data.eml:eml: Two new species of whip spider (Amblypygi): an epigean and a cave dwelling Charinus Simon, 1892 from Belize

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miranda, Gustavo Silva De, Giupponi, Alessandro Ponce De Leão, Wizen, Gil (2016): Two new species of whip spider (Amblypygi): an epigean and a cave dwelling Charinus Simon, 1892 from Belize. Zootaxa 4098 (3): 545-559, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.3.7
